alert.note: Alert for Boone County Except Southwest; Marion (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:05AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marion and northeastern Boone Counties through 545 AM CDT... At 505 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles southeast of Omaha, or 15 miles northeast of Harrison, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Diamond City... Lead Hill... Willis... Myrtle... Price Place... Ozark Isle... Crumpler Subdivision... South Lead Hill... Peel... Oakland... Bull Shoals Lake... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
